text: The 53rd Infantry Division (, 53-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army. ==Organization== *1st Brigade **209th Infantry Regiment **210th Infantry Regiment *2nd Brigade **211th Infantry Regiment **212th Infantry Regiment *53rd Artillery Brigade ==Commanders== *1915: S. P. Abakanovich *1915–1917: D. K. Guncadze ==Chiefs of Staff== ==Commanders of the 1st Brigade== *1914–1915: I. A. Kholmsen ==Artillery Brigade Commanders== ==References== Category:Infantry divisions of the Russian Empire
title: 53rd Infantry Division (Russian Empire)
